source: TEXT_GAIUSB510_00879_SEQ_00<tab>Fuandrec is a breath of fresh air in this house of tears and melancholy─very angry air. She needs you to find someone, and quick.
target: TEXT_GAIUSB510_00879_SEQ_00<tab>聖アダマ・ランダマ教会のフアンドレックは、探してほしい人がいるようだ。

source: TEXT_GAIUSB510_00879_SEQ_01<tab>Fuandrec's feckless cousin is late for a burial, not the first time he has failed to mark the time. There is naught to do but for you to look for a suitably slipshod person near Halatali.
target: TEXT_GAIUSB510_00879_SEQ_01<tab>葬儀に参列するはずの親戚がまだ来ないらしい。「ハラタリ修練所」周辺へ向かい、フアンドレックの親戚「いい加減そうな旅人」を探そう。

source: TEXT_GAIUSB510_00879_SEQ_02<tab>Near the ruin of training grounds, you encounter a pair of escaped Coliseum soulkin about to slice a wayfarer to pieces. Rather than wax philosophical, you dispatch the doctores and save Fuandrec's cousin. Report the happy news to her.
target: TEXT_GAIUSB510_00879_SEQ_02<tab><var 28 ((BNpcName)) F204A401 /var>を倒し、旅人を救助した。聖アダマ・ランダマ教会の「フアンドレック」に報告しよう。

source: TEXT_GAIUSB510_00879_SEQ_03<tab>You speak with Fuandrec and tactfully leave out her cousin's mention of her “overtight” corset lacing. However, judging from Fuandrec's own barbs, they are a two of a kind.
target: TEXT_GAIUSB510_00879_SEQ_03<tab>フアンドレックに報告をした。フアンドレックは、2回葬儀をせずにすんだと胸をなでおろしていた。
TEXT_GAIUSB510_00879_TODO_00<tab>いい加減そうな旅人を探す

source: TEXT_GAIUSB510_00879_FUANDREC_000_000<tab>Where <var 1A 02 /var>is<var 1A 01 /var> that turnip-head? We have already waited some hours for my cousin, and still he dallies Thal knows where. He is ever late, I do not understand why he cannot simply depart early!
target:
TEXT_GAIUSB510_00879_FUANDREC_000_000<tab>遅いわねぇ、まだかしら……。
葬儀に参列する予定の親戚が、いつになっても来ないのよ。
……昔からいい加減で困ってるの。

source: TEXT_GAIUSB510_00879_FUANDREC_000_001<tab>Still, I confess, I am fond of the fool. I would go look for him but his route winds close to the Halatali training grounds, and they say 'tis a romp of beasts there─beasts of the most dangerous kind.
target:
TEXT_GAIUSB510_00879_FUANDREC_000_001<tab>探しに行きたいのは、やまやまなんだけど……。
彼ってば「ハラタリ修練所」の近くを通ってくるらしいの。
ほら、あの辺りって魔物がたくさんでしょう？

source: TEXT_GAIUSB510_00879_FUANDREC_000_002<tab>You <var 1A 02 /var>are<var 1A 01 /var> an adventurer, and surely this is the sort of thing that, oh, I don't know, makes your blood sing, heart boil, or some such piffle. Will you look for my feckless cousin?
target:
TEXT_GAIUSB510_00879_FUANDREC_000_002<tab>……あなた、冒険者さんよねぇ？
私のかわりに、うちの親戚を探してきてくれないかしら？

TEXT_GAIUSB510_00879_DUMMY_000_010<tab>　ハラタリ修練所方面でＮＰＣに近づくとデュラハン×２沸き
　ＮＰＣにアクセスして「救助」
　「救助」するとお礼を言ってウォークアウトする

source: TEXT_GAIUSB510_00879_NPC_000_020<tab>Thank you, thank you, and thank you thrice! Saw those rather nasty brutes coming and thought...well, nothing much really beyond “AAARGH!” They really should take old Halatali down─the place has absolutely gone to pot.
target:
TEXT_GAIUSB510_00879_NPC_000_020<tab>ありがとう、助かったよ……。
見慣れない魔物に襲われて、もうだめかと……。
ハラタリ修練所の近くなんて、通るもんじゃないな。

source: TEXT_GAIUSB510_00879_NPC_000_021<tab>Oh, look at the time. Mustn't keep the burial waiting too much longer. I s'pose my cousin Fuandrec, she of the overtight corset, is none too pleased.
target:
TEXT_GAIUSB510_00879_NPC_000_021<tab>おっと、ずいぶんと遅れてしまった。
……ヤバイなぁ、フアンドレック、怒ってるよなぁ……。

source: TEXT_GAIUSB510_00879_FUANDREC_000_030<tab>Oh, thank you! He is absolutely incorrigible, but to think we might have had to bury him as well! Then again, that's one burial he wouldn't have been late for. There's a thought.
target:
TEXT_GAIUSB510_00879_FUANDREC_000_030<tab>親戚を助けてくれたのね、ありがとう。
危うく、2回も葬儀をするところだったわ。
……まぁ、それでもよかったかもしれないけど……。
TEXT_GAIUSB510_00879_ACCESS_MESSAGE<tab>その行動は出現した敵を倒さないと実行できません
